description: Looking for a St. Patrick's Day drink that will knock your socks off? Look no further than the Emerald&nbsp;Martini.Whether you are in for a new twist on green beer or just want to enjoy the&nbsp;holiday with friends, this tart cocktail will have everyone talking. This green-hued cocktail has&nbsp;vodka, curacao, Midori melon liqueur, and lime juice. It's perfect for celebrating St. Patrick's Day in style!
name: Emerald Martini
